description:
This “Node.js Tutorial: Socket.IO Programming Tutorial “course takes you through installing and setting up Node.js along with adding in Socket.io.  I also build 2 simple programs to show examples of how node can be used along with a database connection. I end the series with some quick debugging tips.

Take this Node.js Tutorial: Socket.IO Programming Tutorial course now and learn the basics.

</p>
title: Node.js and Socket.IO for beginners
